posts.author: blksabbath74
posts.content:
I've wanted to build a Bard 20/Monk 20 for some time. I'm still looking for a PW that will allow it, but this isn't quite that, as Arelith builds max out at 30.

Still, the possibility of Bard Song with Monk Speed is too good to pass up. Arelith also offers Quarterstaff as a Monk Weapon, meaning that the Two Weapon Fighting feats can be shaved, and I'm not using Kama.

I was looking at a Dex based Bard 20/Monk 6/Paladin 4, but don't really know what I'm doing, so I'm pretty flexible on everything.

My firm requirements would be...

Lasting Inspiration
Curse Song
Blind Fight
Improved Expertise (not sure why)
Monk Speed
GSF Transmutation
Conc/Disc/Heal/Perf/

Other that that, pretty flexible on Dex vs Strength, Weapon Focus, 3rd Class, Feats, ect.

Thanks in advance for your help.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Maybe a (Bard 20/ Ftr 4/ Monk 6) would accomplish most of what you want, can't say for sure,
Arelith is a severely restricted environment with many rule modifications.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Another idea would be Bard 16 / Monk 8 / Fighter 6 (At level 20: Bard 8 / Monk 8 / Fighter 4).   This would get you Knockdown/IKD earlier (pre-epic, instead of having to wail until epic levels), Epic Weapon Spec, and I have heard that Bard 16 is the sweet spot for the Bard song.
